name: Mini-golf Demo
description:
Play the first level of an exciting new mini-golf game. Get the ball into the hole in the least amount of swings that you can! 

Controls:

Arrow Keys to look around, Enter key to choose power and swing. 

You can press R at any time to reset the ball to where you started at that hole. 

This game is a WIP. I hope you enjoy!! 

Music Credits: Pixabay.com: Happy Upbeat - Asepirawan20,  Victory March - TomazM2 , CCMixer.org: The Vendetta - Stefan Kartenberg , freeSFX.org: Horse Play - SI_PML
